steps.description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.modified_description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on unclean kitchen surface

errors.description: place on unclean kitchen surface instead of cutting board

steps.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, overflowing the edges

errors.description: spread the butter without leaving any edge gap

steps.description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar and spill some out

errors.description: spill some out while scooping jelly

steps.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread jelly over the other side of the tortilla

errors.description: spread the jelly over the other side of the tortilla instead of spreading it on butter

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with fingers

errors.description: use hand instead of towel to clean

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps and filling leaks out of tortilla

steps.description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the hand using fingers, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll

errors.description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla using hand

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.modified_description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 10 toothpicks about 1/2 inch apart

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
steps.modified_description: Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top on one edge of the tortilla

errors.description: we are slicing in a way there is no toothpick in pin wheel

steps.description: pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
